price: Ey iman edenler! Kâfirlerden (öncelikle) yakınınızda olanlarla savaşın ve onlar sizde bir sertlik bulsunlar. Allah’ın muttakilerle beraber olduğunu bilin.
arabic: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ قَٰتِلُواْ ٱلَّذِينَ يَلُونَكُم مِّنَ ٱلۡكُفَّارِ وَلۡيَجِدُواْ فِيكُمۡ غِلۡظَةٗۚ وَٱعۡلَمُوٓاْ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ مَعَ ٱلۡمُتَّقِينَ

version.title: Turkish translation - Shaaban Britsh
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by Shaaban Britsh. Notice: Some referred translated verses corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: yāayyuhā alladhīna āmanū qātilū alladhīna yalūnakum mina al-kufāri walyajidū fīkum ghil'ẓatan wa-iʿ'lamū anna al-laha maʿa al-mutaqīna
